item.title: New tenant on gowlett road, 7th December
item.description:
New neighbour on gowlett road is leaving her excess rubbish from moving in, outside our block.. was seen on 2 separate occasions.. putting rubbish in our bins also

item.title: Fly tipped pallet in car park next to Chatsworth Parade, off Queensway, BR5 1DE, 7th December
item.description:
This pallet has now been there for 3 days, so has obviously been fly tipped. Please can it be removed, thank you. Located beside Sutton Windows, 37 Chatsworth Parade, Queensway, Petts Wood, BR5 1DE.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queensway, Petts Wood, Greater London

item.title: Constant fly tipping, 7th December
item.description:
Corner of Amhurst road and Sydner Road Currently broken up sofa dumped but pile is growing fast. Thanks for your attempts to keep this corner free of rubbish but it appears to be a well known fly tipping spot
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Offensive and racist graffiti on railway footbridge, near to 217 Petts Wood Road, BR5 1LA, 7th December
item.description:
This offensive and racist graffiti has appeared on the footbridge overnight (6th-7th December). Please can you arrange for it to be removed. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Dip in lane getting bigger weekly, 7th December
item.description:
This bit of road (country lane) was resurfaced. However this part of road is now dipping very baddy. Horses walk up this road daily and horseboxes etc drive up and down. This needs to be looked at ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bunkers Hill, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all over the land, 7th December
item.description:

item.title: How can we get this bin removed?, 7th December
item.description:
I was away and I'm back. How can we get this bin removed? How can we stop rat running this road? Vans speed down it and fly tip on their way to Leyland. This isn't exactly an LTN at this point.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Road, Hackney, London
